comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content:
he is listed in 1915's  "Who's who along the north shore of Massachusetts Bay"

Di Cellere, Count V. Macchi, B. F.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vincent_Macchi_Di_Cellere [http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/4765059513/] Count di Cellere, Retiring Italian Ambassador, Dies on Operating Table in Washington October 21, 1919, Tuesday Count Macchi di Celere, the retiring Italian Ambassador, died suddenly in the Emergency Hospital here at 9:40 o'clock tonight. The stated cause of his death is a blood clot of the mesenteric passages. Source: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C0CEFD81038EE32A...
